## Basic statistics

```{r}
lipidomics |>
  group_by(metabolite) |>
  summarise(across(
    value,
    list(
      mean = mean,
      sd = sd
    )
  )) |>
  mutate(across(
    where(is.numeric),
    ~ round(.x, digits = 1)
  ))
```

```{r}
#' Function descr stats
#'
#' @param data Title 
#'
#' @return A data.frame/tibble
#' 
descriptive_stats <- function(data) {
  data |>
    dplyr::group_by(metabolite) |>
    dplyr::summarise(
      dplyr::across(
        value,
        list(
          mean = mean,
          sd = sd
        )
      )) |>
    dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across(
      where(is.numeric),
      ~ round(.x, digits = 1)
    ))
}
```
